firstNightReminder: The Lookout points to 1 player. Point to 3 players, at least one of which chose the Lookout’s target tonight. The Lookout points to 1 player. Point to 3 players, at least one of which chose the Lookout’s target tonight. Or, if no one chose their target, shake your head to signal 'no'.
otherNightReminder: The Lookout points to 1 player. Point to 3 players, at least one of which chose the Lookout’s target tonight. The Lookout points to 1 player. Point to 3 players, at least one of which chose the Lookout’s target tonight. Or, if no one chose their target, shake your head to signal 'no'.
name: Lookout
ability: Each night, choose a player. You learn 3 players, at least one of whom chose them tonight (excluding yourself). If no one chose them (excluding yourself), you learn so.

firstNightReminder: The Sheriff points to a player. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether that player is a Townsfolk.
otherNightReminder: The Sheriff points to a player. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether that player is a Townsfolk.
name: Sheriff
ability: Each night, choose a player. You learn if they are a Townsfolk. One player registers falsely to you.

otherNightReminder: The Escort points to a player. That player is drunk until dawn.
name: Escort
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night). They are drunk until dawn.

otherNightReminder: If the Jailor nominated today, they point to a player, and shows the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for if they want to shoot. That player is Jailed. If the Jailor shoots a Minion, the Minion dies.
name: Jailor
ability: Each night*, if you nominated today, choose a player. They canâ€™t die & are drunk until dawn. Once per game, you may shoot: if they are a Minion, they die.

otherNightReminder: Show the Medium two character tokens, at least one of which is in play and dead.
name: Medium
ability: Each night*, if anyone is dead, you learn two roles, at least one of which is in play and dead.

otherNightReminder: The Retributionist points to two players. If the first is a dead Townsfolk who chooses one player at night, their ability is used on the second. Wake them at the time the ability would resolve.
name: Retributionist
ability: Each night*, choose a first and second player. If the first is a dead Townsfolk who chooses one player at night, you gain their ability until dawn and use it on the second. Otherwise, you are drunk until dawn.

otherNightReminder: The Transporter points to two living players. If they point to a dead player, show a 'no' head signal and have the Transporter point again. If a player would chose one of them tonight, act as if they chose the other.
name: Transporter
ability: Each night*, choose two living players. Tonight, any abilities that target one instead target the other. You cannot kill the Demon this way. You are sober and healthy.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon chose the Vampire Hunter, wake them, and show them the Vampire token.
name: Vampire Hunter
ability: You are safe from the Demon and learn if you are chosen by them. [The Demon is a Vampire]

otherNightReminder: The Veteran shows the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for if they want to go on Alert. If a player chooses them while on Alert, show the player the Veteran token.
name: Veteran
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose to go on Alert. If you do, tonight you cannot die, and all non-Demon players who chose you tonight die and learn of you. Their abilities resolve. You are sober and healthy.

otherNightReminder: The Vigilante either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a player. If that player is a non-Demon, they die. If they are a Townsfolk, the Vigilante dies instead.
name: Vigilante
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player. A chosen non-Demon dies. If they are a Townsfolk, you die instead.

otherNightReminder: The Bodyguard points to a player. That player is Guarded. If they would die, the Bodyguard dies, and that player is woken and shown the Bodyguard token.
name: Bodyguard
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself). If they would die, you die instead and they learn of you.

otherNightReminder: The Doctor points to a player. That player is Healed. If they would die tonight, wake the Doctor, and show them the Doctor token.
name: Doctor
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself). They cannot die until dawn. If they would, you learn so.

firstNightReminder: Point to a Good player to show the Executioner’s target.
name: Executioner
ability: You start knowing a Good player. Your team cannot win while they live, even if you are dead.

firstNightReminder: Choose a player that is drunk.
otherNightReminder: If the Jester was mad as the Jester today, choose if they die.
name: Jester
ability: 1 player is drunk, even if you are dead. If you are executed, you are drunk. If you are mad about being the Jester, you might die tonight.

otherNightReminder: The Survivor shows the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for if they want to put on their bulletproof vest.
name: Survivor
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may choose to put on a bulletproof vest; you cannot die tonight.If you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

otherNightReminder: The Town Traitor points to a player. The Town Traitor becomes that player’s alignment. Show the 'You are' card. Show the hand signal (thumbs-up 'good', thumbs-down 'evil') for the Town Traitor’s current alignment. If the Town Traitor becomes Evil, they are poisoned.
name: Town Traitor
ability: Each night*, choose a player. You become their alignment. If you become Evil, you are poisoned.

otherNightReminder: The Ambusher points to a player. The first Townsfolk to choose that player tonight dies and is shown the Ambusher token, after their ability resolves.
name: Ambusher
ability: Each night*, choose a player. The first Townsfolk to choose them tonight dies and knows of you. Their ability resolves.

otherNightReminder: If a player chose the Hypnotist, point to the player and show them that player’s character token. The Hypnotist points to a player, shows the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for if they want their target to recieve false information, and may point to a character on their sheet if they want their target to be shown that token.
name: Hypnotist
ability: You know players who choose you at night. Each night*, choose a player. Decide what type of information they receive from the storyteller tonight, if applicable.

firstNightReminder: Point to all doused players. The arsonist chooses a player. That player is doused. If the arsonists points to themselves, all doused players die, and are no longer doused.
otherNightReminder: Point to all doused players. The arsonist chooses a player. That player is doused. If the arsonists points to themselves, all doused players die, and are no longer doused.
name: Arsonist
ability: Each night, choose a player. They are doused along with the first non-doused player who chose you tonight. If you choose yourself, instead all doused players die and are no longer doused. You know who is doused, and they register as an evil minion or demon. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Serial Killer points to a player. They die.
name: Serial Killer
ability: Each night*, choose a player. They die. The first Townsfolk to choose you at night is poisoned until dawn.

otherNightReminder: The Vampire points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was a Townsfolk and there are no other Vampire in play: Show the Vampire the Vampire token. The chosen player is now an evil vampire. Wake the new Vampire. Show the 'You are' card, then the Vampire token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.
name: Vampire
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The first Townsfolk this would kill instead becomes an Evil Vampire and is poisoned. You learn this. [−1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Werewolf points to a player. They die.
name: Werewolf
ability: Each night*, if you did not wake last night, choose a player: they die. If you woke last night, it is a full moon; Townsfolk are poisoned until dawn.
